file_content.text: I'm transmitting Mynock's report to my superiors. Thanks again.
Your Agent Mynock didn't make it. But we ran across his datapad and files.
I'm sorry, your Agent Mynock didn't make it. But I found his datapad and files.
Blast it. Another good man lost to this place. May I see that?
This is... everything I needed. Mynock always came through. Looks like we've got some arrests to make.
SIS owes you a favor. For now, take this. And watch your back out there.
Mynock's already taken enough risks for us. Please, don't keep him waiting.
Excuse me. Agent Firehawk, with the Strategic Information Service.
I'd like to request the assistance of the Jedi Order in a... difficult matter.
I know Havoc Squad isn't under SIS jurisdiction, but I'm formally requesting your help.
I have a... difficult matter to handle, and I could use some outside help.
I normally work alone, but if you're interested, I need a team to conduct a tough assignment.
Before the breakout, I had an agent, Mynock, planted among the prisoners. He "escaped" with the others to keep his cover, and I've lost contact.
To stick to his duty, even now--that's impressive.
He must be dedicated.
You have strange methods.
Espionage isn't safe. We had to get inside the heads of a dozen Republic traitors, this was our best bet.
One slipup and those prisoners would have eaten him for breakfast.
That's a risky operation.
Mynock's got guts. He sat in that cell eavesdropping on traitors for over a year.
Someone gets out of jail, they've got places to go.
Well, he just got his freedom.
Amusing. Here's your punch line: Mynock may have secrets from Republic traitors that he needs to report.
Who was he spying on?
Mynock was observing Republic traitors, filth who sold our secrets to the Empire. I want what they know.
Maybe he defected.
Maybe he defected.
It's possible he went rogue. He was deep undercover, among Republic traitors. But I hope not.
Agent Mynock has a tracking device implanted, of course, but the signal leads into a network of caves. Preliminary data says they're crawling with native fauna.
It's high time Mynock was extracted, I need him found. Would you be willing?
Consider it done.
Thanks. I can tell you where these caves are, but they haven't been mapped properly. Be careful.
What about Mynock's cell mates? You said he was preserving his cover.
And the other prisoners?
I'm pulling the plug. If they cooperate, fine--otherwise, do whatever's necessary.
Remember, Mynock is priority one. His report could expose dozens of Republic traitors; our security's at stake.
No. [Refuse quest]
Then I need to call for an extraction team. I hope Mynock can keep it together until then.
Sorry, no time to chat.
